tagline: Multilingual Developer | IT Enthusiast | Book & Travel Lover
about_description: Hello! I’m Henry, a multilingual developer based in Japan...
motivation_text: I attended the company's briefing and factory tour, and I was deeply impressed by the innovative solutions that your company is pioneering across various industries through the latest technological advancements. I was especially drawn to the vision of solving societal issues like the declining birthrate and aging population. I hope to contribute with my development skills and grow alongside your company.
appeal_text: I’m proactive, communicative, and responsible. I calmly assess situations and take swift action. I’ve worked in diverse teams and built smooth relationships. My sense of responsibility is rooted in Japanese cultural values. I believe these qualities will help me grow and contribute to your organization.
